htmlBody: This article is rather confusing and difficult to follow. The basic insight seems to be that allocating resources and tasks to different people can have higher expected utility. I think this could be better expressed in words, and it might be nice to explain how this relates to EA in future articles of this kind.
Thanks! I'll edit the article in relation to this tomorrow (around 12 hours from now.)
Ok! I'm done with draft 2. any more suggestions? Did I meet your requests?
